sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ImportSetRowHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Helper for Import Set Rows</description>
        <name>ImportSetRowHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ImportSetRowHelper = Class.create();
ImportSetRowHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	canReadImportSets : function() {
		var importSetGR  = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_import_set");
		return importSetGR.canRead();
	},
	
	canReadTransformMaps : function() {
		var transformMapGR  = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_transform_map");
		return transformMapGR.canRead();
	},
	
	canReadImportSetRuns : function() {
		var importSetRunGR  = new GlideRecordSecure("sys_import_set_run");
		return importSetRunGR.canRead();
	},
	
    type: 'ImportSetRowHelper'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-09-29 22:25:39</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>07ad84c073940010952d31d7caf6a78e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ImportSetRowHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="System Import Sets" source="com.glide.system_import_set">2c5d38876d2220100acb70b353433034</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_07ad84c073940010952d31d7caf6a78e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-09-30 23:34:53</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>572</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
